name: Pillars of Light
description:
Pillars of Light is a first person puzzle game that will let you control the power of light against shadows.

Carry on your legacy

You will help Utu, the light god, to protect the world after your father's death.

Fight against shadows

To solve the puzzles, you will have to mix light colors, move crates around, ask for Utu to help you, jump and sprint to avoid monsters around. You will have to explore dark places and move carefully in area the shadows control.

Explore forgotten worlds

You'll have to visit many places from a lost temple to an old dungeon, each with its own atmosphere, puzzles and dedicated OST
